price: Ni tampoco la palabra de un adivino. ¡Qué poco reflexionan!
arabic: وَلَا بِقَوۡلِ كَاهِنٖۚ قَلِيلٗا مَّا تَذَكَّرُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: walā biqawli kāhinin qalīlan mā tadhakkarūna
